analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ upekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
